website_summaries.verdict: This is a great option if you're looking for a lightweight travel case to store a few clubs when you don't want to bring your whole golf bag.
pros: Padded, rigid case with detachable plastic tube to protect clubs
Lightweight bag that's easy to carry
cons: Some users have complained about the shoulder strap being uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the subway, still holds the big clubs.
customer_reviews.text: If you are an urban dweller and want to hit at a range or simulator before, during, after — or instead of — work, but dread taking your clubs on public transportation, this is a game changer. Literally. This bag is small enough to not be a nuisance, but big enough to hold even my largest driver along with a couple of other clubs. I like that it has both a shoulder strap and a handle.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyBroad

customer_reviews.title: Great to take on vacation
customer_reviews.text: What a great case to take on vacation. We just took it to Hawaii and we were able to put it into the regular golf travel bag along with a full set of clubs. We saved money on the airline shipping and I didn't miss any of the clubs I left behind, I was able to take 9 of my favorites. The pocket in front is pretty small but I just attached my regular golf bag to the outside to carry balls etc. It was easy to carry and attach to the golf cart while playing. I'm very happy with it and will leave the big bag at home for future golf holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great club protection
customer_reviews.text: Brought this with me to the Bahamas and it fit six of my favorite clubs. Great quality; the pockets were just enough to fit my gloves, a few balls and the tee holders were great. I flew in private jet so there was no issue with bringing it as a carry on; you might check ahead of time though with your airlines if it can be so. The bag offered great protection because of the hard lining but I won't recommend banging the heads to much. I did not carry it with my covers.
customer_reviews.author: Tiberio Fabricante

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wonderful, but I am able to take half a ...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wonderful, but I am able to take half a dozen clubs (Driver,3hybrid,5,7,PW,putter) by motorcycle with this. Room for 6-8 balls in the lower pocket. Daisy chain for tee storage. Not the easiest to take clubs out of/replace into when actually golfing, but not aggravatingly difficult either.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Otis

customer_reviews.title: These carry bags ROCK.  Makes traveling w clubs a breeze.
customer_reviews.text: So, we're able to put 5-6 clubs in each bag. Usually driver, 5 hybrid, 7 iron, PW/SW, and putter. The petite size makes it sooooo much easier to transport clubs... in airports, trains, cars, you name it. Because of club length, we still have to check them, but trust me, if we could get away with carrying them on, we totally would. Only down side (and it's not a product flaw), is that the airlines charge for excess baggage, so we end up consolidating these two tiny bags into one larger bag. But we play on vacation much more frequently because we're not carrying around a massive set of clubs. Thanks K-Cliffs!!!
customer_reviews.author: jajonesey

customer_reviews.title: k-cliffs driving mini range bag
customer_reviews.text: excellent sunday bag. carries just enough clubs for the range or a short course. sturdy. my only issue with this bag is that for someone like myself who is short, 5'3" the handle is to far forward and the bag strap makes it difficult to carry. the bottom of the bag, when using the strap, just about touches the ground. otherwise, the bag is great.
customer_reviews.author: JillBean

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, compact, not a whole set
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt fit an entire set of clubs, if you try it is such a tight fit it makes it real hard to pull them out. Actually got a lot of compliments from other golfers asking where I got it. For a stripped down set it would work. Overall happy with the quality and style, if they made it another inch in diameter it would be PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Sherman

customer_reviews.title: This golf bag was very convenient and helpful and I like it very much!
customer_reviews.text: This golf bag was very convenient and useful for carrying golf clubs and playing golf while traveling. One thing I want to ask to fix is the zipper's direction in outside pouch bag.. When I play golf, I needed to get some golf balls from pouch bag and the zip was from down to upper direction and golf balls were falling out while I was getting them.
customer_reviews.author: Mijoo Choi

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight nylon golf bag
customer_reviews.text: This feels like a quality bag when I go on a par three course and only need to carry for clubs. I attached the shoulder strap to the top of the handle carrier so that my clubs don’t tip over and fall out. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Could easily be better.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and has served me well. Allows me to travel light, to the range (I keep a few irons in the trunk for when I feel like hitting some (we have 24 hr ranges out here). My only complaint is that the zippered pocket really should have the zipper run in the opposite direction (top, down, not bottom, up) (or have a dual zipper that could be opened and closed from either perspective). When using the bag in the upright position you'd use to pull your clubs out, the zippered pocket opens from the bottom to the top, rendering it useless, as whatever is in the pocket falls out/down. I would recommend (with a caveat).
customer_reviews.author: tympanik

customer_reviews.title: Great bag especially for riding a moto
customer_reviews.text: This is great Sunday bag or even for a par 3 course. I bought bag so I can haul my clubs when I ride my scooter down to the course during the week when there is a lot of traffic. It can hold 7-8 clubs easy and that's with a driver also.
customer_reviews.author: pudge

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great range bag. It has a tube inside that makes this bag solid. I could fit a driver, hybrid and three irons easily. It does not have a hard base or padded base. Pockets are smaller than expected so I cannot put my wallet in either pockets. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: User H

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't what I needed but my fault for not being more careful in ordering.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bag I could take onto a golf course with just a few clubs. But instead, it's a travel bag that completely covers and zips in the clubs. So, as a travel bag it's great, but for carrying it around a golf course, it's totally unsuitable. My fault... should have looked at specs and pictures more carefully.
customer_reviews.author: JTM

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked the weight and design of this bag, it's perfect for me to ride my bike to the par3 near my house, it holds plenty of clubs including my driver and balls and tees. The clubs zip in so nothing can fall out during my ride. This bag is made well and has very nice features.
customer_reviews.author: luv469camaros

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Bag
customer_reviews.text: We used this as a lightweight bag to transport our putters and drivers to use with rental clubs. It holds four (4) clubs very well.
customer_reviews.author: Skash

customer_reviews.title: Perfect golf bag to ride to the range
customer_reviews.text: Perfect golf bag to ride to the range. All it needs is a more durable shoulder shape to get the 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Butters

customer_reviews.title: not what I expected but still decent for lightweight portability
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting back into golf and I'm not an expert on golf bags. I like the size of it and can place about 9 clubs into it easily. carrying it around is a bit of a pain and I was a little sad that the straps were placed where they were making it an awkward carry, it's more bottom heavy. I wish I could wear it like a book bag almost.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Y.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.  Not sure on durability.
customer_reviews.text: Good for 5 or 6 clubs, less if you’re taking a driver. Shoulder strap is nice. Lightweight. Strapped this to the back of my golf cart and it was fine. Much better than lugging a full set through the airport. I am seeing some significant wear on the bottom of this bag after only one trip and one round, but it hasn’t torn through, yet.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoPete

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Driving Range
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little bag for leaving in your car for unplanned trips to the driving range. An alignment rod, two irons, a large mallet putter, and my 3 wood fit in it nicely. The ball pouch on mine was designed properly. (I assume that they fixed that design flaw mentioned in previous reviews.) There is even a band for holding some tees. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Commodore

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I would change is the carry strap. It needs to be attached at the top in a different way so that you can carry without zipping the top closed.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I use it to carry a few clubs in the RV when we go camping. Its perfect to save space.
customer_reviews.author: aptao

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. No longer carry the whole set to the drive range. It fits up to 4 clubs. 5 is exaggerating. I only put 3 in there and leave it in the trunk of my car. Some of the guys at the range asked where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin

customer_reviews.title: Great bag - traveled to Hawaii and Australia in one ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag - traveled to Hawaii and Australia in one trip - carried 7 clubs no problem. No damage - saved a ton on club rentals... Two people saw it at airport and wanted to buy one just like it.... Great protection...wrapped the top of drivers and irons with 2 golf towels inside the top for extra padding.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Immediately I noticed that this bag was VERY uncomfortable and the other bag felt so much more comfortable with the extra "cross
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag and the Lite Caddie Cart Bag at the same time. Immediately I noticed that this bag was VERY uncomfortable and the other bag felt so much more comfortable with the extra "cross strap". I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: RFW

customer_reviews.title: K-cliffs, when you got to have a few clubs to practice on travel.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag for taking a few clubs on vacation without the extra weight of a full bag. This can easily fit a few irons, a driver and a putter; also big enough for the club glove "stiff arm" driver protector, a couple of balls and a glove.
customer_reviews.author: good_equipment_bad_photographer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for taking a few clubs on trips. Much better than dragging a full size bag. Quality seems good. Plenty of room for a par 3 course. Someone else commented how they would be more apt to take clubs along on a trip and I totally agree.
customer_reviews.author: bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome undercover subway golfbag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome. Minimalistic look, perfect for the undercover subway ride with enough space for driver, woog, couple of irons, putter, 3 balls and some tees. Also the padding of the bag is great. Materials appear high quality. Only downside is that the shoulder band is kind of slippery, but I think that can be fixed easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its nice when you want to go to the range but ...
customer_reviews.text: Its nice when you want to go to the range but don't want to take all your clubs and bag. the bag its is light and tough (nylon fabric) the one big problem i have with it is the top claps digs into your shoulder and very uncomfortable if you happen to be carrying for anything more then 5 minutes. designers could have done a better job there.
customer_reviews.author: S. Foss

customer_reviews.title: will be traveling with it in a few days. ...
customer_reviews.text: will be traveling with it in a few days. Hope it survives the plane cargo hold. So the fit is tight for a driver, putter, fairway wood and a wedge.
customer_reviews.author: RayJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for practice range
customer_reviews.text: Clears out my trunk space. Not sure I’d check it on a plane.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great travel bag!
customer_reviews.text: We were able to get 10 clubs in it! This will great to bring on a trip. Only negative thing is no room for shoes but overall it’s great and I am going to buy one for myself too! Great travel bag!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sunday bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the K- Cliff travel mainly to take my clubs with me when I travel for business and when I’m practicing driving, putting and pitching. I’m impressed with the quality and look of the bag. I’d recommend this bag to my golf pals.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Green

customer_reviews.title: Great for the driving range
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Good storage for a small bag. Use at the driving range.
customer_reviews.author: D. A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for going to the range on my bicycle or ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for going to the range on my bicycle or bus, and for a round of golf without needing to carry a full bag. Comfortably fits five clubs including my driver, and has a small side pocket for gloves and a stitched tee holder around the pocket. Well constructed and the perfect solution for the urban dweller living in a high-rise apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Malty

customer_reviews.title: Bad straps
customer_reviews.text: Straps does not allow to easily stay on back so you can bike to range as advertised. No point in owning if the goal is light weight travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait for an upcoming trip so he can golf easily. He found the pockets to be adequate
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for Xmas and he has now used a few times and really likes it. Can't wait for an upcoming trip so he can golf easily. He found the pockets to be adequate, likes the light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Nice carrier for a few clubs.
customer_reviews.text: I got this case to take a few clubs to the driving range. It seems to be just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ed  R

customer_reviews.title: Good to buy
customer_reviews.text: I can use this bag to carry two wood drives and three iron.
customer_reviews.author: Ming Tang

customer_reviews.title: perfect little travel bag
customer_reviews.text: love this bag. took it to iceland when i didn't want to lug around a huge case and it was perfect. super light but very durable. i fit 7 clubs including a putter and a hybrid iron no problem
customer_reviews.author: setty17

customer_reviews.title: When You Don't Need It All
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly wanted, something to carry a driver, an iron, a wedge, a putter and a few accessories to the driving range.
customer_reviews.author: J. Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Would like the pouch to be just a bit larger to ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds several clubs and a driver. Would like the pouch to be just a bit larger to hold more chipping balls but still happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Haley DeRieux

customer_reviews.title: Range ready
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. Lightweight. Holds just the right amount of clubs (7) for me to take to the range.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Works well for RV travel ,we only carry 6 clubs
customer_reviews.author: Rick Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunday travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Holds a number of clubs. Putter, SW, PW, 3,5,7,9 rescue and 3 wood. But it was packed. Would not put that many clubs in next time. I like that it zippers closed so I was able to pack a partial set of clubs and ship it when I flew without lugging an entire set of clubs around the airport.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, changes simplifies business travel with your clubs.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. I could fit 4 irons, a 3 wood, driver and putter into this bag. It has a good amount of padded to keep everything protected, just keep your head covers on. This thing is perfect for walking the course and weighs practically nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Selltoyou

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good. loves it. walk to the range since it's nearby. wish there is a pocket for water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Qi Li

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product for carrying a few clubs to the range. Very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L Moore

customer_reviews.title: Massive Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: This bag is fine other than one massive flaw - the shoulder strap could not have been designed any worse. It makes the bag impossible to carry comfortably. Don’t buy this product if you plan to actually carry the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew McManus

customer_reviews.title: So so quality
customer_reviews.text: The main zipper broke. Keep only 2-3 clubs in it. Anything more and the zipper busts open.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: it makes golf and the driving range a snap
customer_reviews.text: i love the sunday bag. i get to pack 5 clubs and my putter. it's now my travel golf bag 'cause i can play any course with 4-5 clubs & my putter and i don't have to hassle with my big pro bag...
customer_reviews.author: DonSanAnto

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for the range
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for the range, the should strap is basically useless as the weight of the clubs pushes it to fall off your shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Hard tube doesn't leave much room for clubs there are better designs out there.
customer_reviews.text: Hard tube doesn't leave much room for clubs there are better designs out there.
customer_reviews.author: imollyq

customer_reviews.title: Good size. Holds the clubs I need to go ...
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Holds the clubs I need to go to the driving range. Would suggest a rubber patch on the bottom where it sits on thegreounf.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Fox

customer_reviews.title: Good, small pocket in 2015 bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice very portable bag, only improvement would be a larger side pocket or multiple pockets - 2015 bag pocket is too small for large phone, wallet, keys, and a few golf balls
customer_reviews.author: Chewbacca

customer_reviews.title: Good, but with a major flaw.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice bag to take to the range or par 3 course, but it has a major design flaw. The zipper on the storage compartment is on the wrong side. Open it while you are carrying the bag and all your stuff falls out. It should open to the top. Other than that very basic problem, it's a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo

customer_reviews.title: Great range/ Par-3 bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for taking a couple clubs to the range. Able to fit a 3w, 5I, 9I, SW and my putter for a quick 9. Description is very accurate, don't expect $150 quality for $35 but with some care you should get much more out than you investment.
customer_reviews.author: 705thMP

customer_reviews.title: Great short hole bag
customer_reviews.text: Great short hole bag. Fits 5-7 clubs and glove pocket holds 7 balls.
customer_reviews.author: P.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, but not improved Zipper direction AS IT ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, but not improved Zipper direction AS IT MENTIONS in the description. Must be getting rid of old stock, and that's what they sent to me, Otherwise 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: RCG

customer_reviews.title: Holds about 6 clubs
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to hold about 5-6 clubs, and long enough so that one of them can be a driver. I use this at the range and practice facility.
customer_reviews.author: mrbill

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for me! I needed a case for some clubs I borrowed from a friend. This one truly fit the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Bloomer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for those times you want to practice, but not haul the whole bag to the range with you.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for those times you want to practice, but not haul the whole bag to the range with you. Materials and construction quality are great.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer X

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Practice Aids
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for hauling all my training clubs and aids around in one place. I do use it and have not had any issue with it.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Citizen

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good product and should accomplish what I want very well. Very fast service! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: john  m.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke first use not even taken through the airport yet. Cheap materials
customer_reviews.author: Ron Minniear

customer_reviews.title: great product!  recommend!
customer_reviews.text: great product! easy to carry! kind of looks like a guitar or rifle case. Definitely getting some strange looks on the subway but loving it hahaha!
customer_reviews.author: jlib78

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my motorcycle, big fan of it
customer_reviews.author: Cole922

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag a lot! Lightweight but very substantial materials. Provides excellent protection from here to the range.
customer_reviews.author: LJP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Used it once so far. Great product. Help up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Ted James

customer_reviews.title: Great product, exactly what I was looking for to carry 4-5 golf clubs
customer_reviews.text: Great product, exactly what I was looking for to bring 4-5 golf clubs, including a driver, to Chelsea Piers driving range in New York City.
customer_reviews.author: John Haar

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely perfect. The quality is not bad either
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely perfect. The quality is not bad either. I like that my clubs are completely enclosed in the case. I have the following inside the case: driver, 3 wood, 6 iron, 9 iron, sand wedge, putter. There is a pouch on the side that holds about 6 balls and T's. I keep this case in my car and I can stop by the driving range at anytime. This set is great for the 9-hole course, which we have near my home. Now I can leave my full set at home and keep this in the car and still be prepared to hit a few ball.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: This is great fits perfectly and looks like great quality as well
customer_reviews.text: This is great fits perfectly and looks like great quality as well. Came in a sturdy box and quickly. Have not had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Good for Training
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for training no need to take the entire club set. But unfortunately the pocket is a bit small to put other than personal things.
customer_reviews.author: Booda71

customer_reviews.title: Small works
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something small & light as I ride my bike to the golf range. It works for me however the bag shifts while I'm climbing the steep hill to the range. Other option was to buy a $300 trailer to haul my cart bag. This was cheaper and a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Keoki

customer_reviews.title: It was too bad to take it.
customer_reviews.text: The item is dirty, stained, and has little damage, and I think someone used it and returned it. It feels so bad to get things.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the driving range!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my daughter trimmed in pink. She liked it, so I bought a black one for me. I am pleased with the bag. Perfect for the driving range!
customer_reviews.author: Lennie C

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag. Fits enough clubs for a range. Only flaw is the shoulder part isn't padded so can get a little annoying.
customer_reviews.author: ss2985

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Uses this to take a few clubs to Mexico for a vacation. Worked great. Would have been nice to have a slightly larger pocket but all in all it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Donald G Olson

customer_reviews.title: Bad product.
customer_reviews.text: The handle and shoulder strap are on the bottom of the bag. I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Atlas

customer_reviews.title: a really bad decision on their part
customer_reviews.text: as another reviewer mention, it's baffling how they decided to put the zipper on the wrong side of the pocket. a really bad decision on their part. something else that has been less than ideal is the metal used for the clasps is soft enough to bend if put to too much pressure. i've had to bend one of the hooks back into shape already. otherwise it's decent. i typically carry my pitcher and putter together for walks of around an hour during my commute. that it can serve that purpose is enough to make it useful enough to keep.
customer_reviews.author: Evigan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, as advertised. Now I'm able to strap this over my shoulder and ride my motorcycle (a tall Beemer) to the local course and hit the driving range or the back 9 packing my glove and balls in the pouch, and my 6 favorite clubs.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for bike or subway commute
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!! I bought this bag so I can take the subway to play golf and it worked perfectly. I took 5 clubs and my driver no problem. Super light weight walked the course with it. I will agree... What were the thinking with the side pouch zipper? If should be on the top so you can get a ball etc wo everything falling out. I just grabbed something out if it when the case was lying flat- so got around it easy.
customer_reviews.author: mlb

customer_reviews.title: Trunk space saver for long trip.
customer_reviews.text: Held 7 clubs well for a trip to the Keys in my Z4 convertible. Couldn't include my driver and six other clubs. So I went with 3 wood, 4 hybrid, 7 wood, 9, 7, wedge and putter--which worked out just as well. Save ALOT of space in the trunk with this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Valve Guy from IL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to take a few clubs to the range...
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect club bag to bring to the range or to a pitch and putt. It holds enough clubs and has a nice zip up closure. I would recommend this to any golfer.
customer_reviews.author: itzgood2bme

customer_reviews.title: great bag, great price.
customer_reviews.text: perfect for what i was looking for. only thing i'd change is the zipper being the other way so you can open the pocket while holding the bag and everything not falling out.
customer_reviews.author: bjackiec7

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't carry as easily as I'd like, not sure why. But good for par 3 courses
customer_reviews.author: Karol Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for carrying 2-3 clubs to the range on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Perfect for carrying 2-3 clubs to the range on a bike.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked well, plenty of space for most my clubs and driver.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C.

customer_reviews.title: A lot more convenient than schlepping your entire golf bag ...
customer_reviews.text: A lot more convenient than schlepping your entire golf bag to the driving range. Will hold up to 3 irons and 1 driver.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Fendler

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work well for carrying a few clubs to the range or an executive 9.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag and easy to carry a few clubs in.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Long term usage will determine how useful and how it holds up
customer_reviews.text: As discribed, seems well made. Could use additional outside pockets. Long term usage will determine how useful and how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Very useful and convenient bag for both walking the course and practice. I also use it for carrying a few clubs while traveling .
customer_reviews.author: McHale A

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, for when I ride my Harley. I carry driver, iron, wedge, putter, two balls, and glove.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Gomez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you bike to the range
customer_reviews.text: Solid and does the job, if you bike to the range it doesn't get caught in the wheels. only will hold 4-5 clubs with the driver but who needs the whole bag if you are going to the range.
customer_reviews.author: It's cold in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for holding a couple wedges
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag for holding a couple wedges, putter, glove and six balls allowing me to hop on my bike and got to practice chipping and putting.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: The bag looked like it was made well
customer_reviews.text: The bag looked like it was made well, but it wasn't exactly what we wanted, so we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Block

customer_reviews.title: Works fine when golfing on a nine hole course
customer_reviews.text: Works fine when golfing on a nine hole course, only walking and needing to carry only four or five clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Ron B.

customer_reviews.title: Have Golf Clubs Will Travel ...
customer_reviews.text: Very useful and would be perfect if it had a few more outside or inside pockets. A few times I showed up at the range and a few guys thought had a rifle in the case. It was kind of funny and scary in the same thought. Anyway I use it all the time at the range. I tried to use this playing Par 3 and Executive 9 Hole course but the lack of pockets make it fall short. Piel Leather Executive Golf Travel Bag Saddle seem to be what one might look for but it might be too expense.
customer_reviews.author: Ward Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Love the quality of the materials. Not too bulky and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for not having to take my whole golf bag or have my clubs loose in the car.
customer_reviews.author: James Lauf

product_meta.title: K-Cliffs Driving Range Mini Course Training Practice Golf Bag Travel Case
feature_bullets: Newly improved shoulder strap with Shoulder Pad, avoid metal buckle digging into shoulder.
Improved zipper direction, increase to two side pockets and T slots size on glove pocket. Holds 6-7 clubs, including driver
Detachable shoulder strap, Accessory zipper pocket with T holder,
Fully padded Rigid body with detachable plastic tube.
Light weight, Water-resistant material, Padded handle, Soft /foldable opening.
